Title: Planning the consumption of grain for the revolution
Publisher: Luoyang Municipal Grain Company (洛阳市粮食公司)
Notes: The poster, from the late 1960s-early 1970s, illustrates the many uses of grain that can be saved through austerity, including support for liberation movements abroad. The slogan underneath reads "Look ahead and behind - economize to avoid running short - careful calculation and strict budgeting - economize on food".
Theme: Cultural Revolution Campaigns (1966-1976)Foreign Friends: National Liberation Movements
